text: Dr. G.N. Saibaba's wife Vasantha (third from right) and his mother Suryawathi (second from left) talking to CPI leader D. Raja during a protest against the re-arrest of Dr. Saibaba and contempt of court charge against Arundhati Roy, at Jantar Mantar in New Delhi on Saturday.- Photo: Shanker Chakravarty
title: Free Saibaba campaign
